vulnerabilities.explanation: The _0x05daa3 function has no access control, allowing anyone to reset all owners and set new ones. This completely compromises the multi-signature wallet functionality by letting attackers take full control.
vulnerabilities.suggested_fix: Add access control to _0x05daa3, requiring existing owner authorization. Implement a proper multi-signature mechanism where changing owners requires approval from multiple current owners.

prediction.overall_explanation: The contract has a critical access control vulnerability in the owner initialization function. Anyone can call _0x05daa3 to reset all owners and take control of the wallet, enabling complete fund theft. Other functions have proper owner checks, but this single vulnerability compromises the entire contract.

Attacker calls _0xa032e7 to selfdestruct the contract, stealing all funds. 5. Or attacker calls _0x6d3034 to transfer all funds to themselves.",
